about_the_game: Get the most out of your Hybrid Wars gaming experience with a new, exclusive character: Yana “Tesla” Radovich, a self-taught genius and one of the best hackers out there. She isn't afraid to get her hands dirty and makes up for the skills she lacks with enthusiasm and unorthodox thinking. Leverage your strengths and unique arsenal to get the upper hand on the Hybrid Wars battlefields!
detailed_description: Get the most out of your Hybrid Wars gaming experience with a new, exclusive character: Yana “Tesla” Radovich, a self-taught genius and one of the best hackers out there. She isn't afraid to get her hands dirty and makes up for the skills she lacks with enthusiasm and unorthodox thinking. Leverage your strengths and unique arsenal to get the upper hand on the Hybrid Wars battlefields!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Core i3 3.2GHz or equal
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 275 or AMD Radeon HD-7770
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Core i7 or equal
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 770 or equal
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 10.6 - 10.11 (Snow Leopard - El Capitan)

  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 275 or AMD Radeon HD-7770
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad

name: Hybrid Wars - Yana 'Tesla' Radovich

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Core i3 3.2GHz or equal
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 275 or AMD Radeon HD-7770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible

Recommended:

short_description: Get your hands on this exclusive hero, a famous technoblogger and promoter of all things futuristic: Yana “Tesla” Radovich. Jump into a future where those with the quickest wits and biggest guns survive.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
